We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private BalanceOfPower _bop;
// In Initialize()
_bop = BOP(symbol,);

// In OnData()
if (_bop.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Is Ready", _bop.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Warm Up Period", _bop.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Current", _bop.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Name", _bop.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Samples", _bop.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.bop = self.BOP(symbol,)

# In OnData()
if self.bop.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Is Ready", self.bop.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Warm Up Period", self.bop.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Current", self.bop.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Name", self.bop.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BOP Samples", self.bop.Samples);
}
